name: firmware
description: PlatformIO firmware workspace for openJII IoT devices. Each subdirectory in sketches/ is a self-contained project

scripts.check-pio:
command -v pio >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo '
PlatformIO CLI not found.
  macOS:   brew install platformio
  pip:     pip install platformio
  docs:    https://docs.platformio.org/en/latest/core/installation/index.html
' && exit 1)
scripts.compile: pnpm --silent run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio run -d "$d"; done
scripts.upload: pnpm --silent run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio run -d "$d" -t upload; done
scripts.monitor: pnpm --silent run check-pio && pio device monitor --baud 115200 --echo
scripts.devices: pnpm --silent run check-pio && pio device list
scripts.test:unit: pnpm --silent run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio test -d "$d"; done
scripts.clean: for d in sketches/*/; do rm -rf "${d}.pio"; done
scripts.check: pnpm --silent run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio check -d "$d"; done
